what about his performance in the match against nz

## Ishan Kishan's Performance Against NZ
Ishan Kishan scored a T20I century against New Zealand, playing a breathtaking innings of 103 off 43 balls. 
* He smashed six fours and ten sixes during his innings.
* He brought up his hundred off just 42 balls, helping India post a massive total of 271/5 in their 20 overs.
* India won the match by 46 runs, and Kishan was adjudged the Player of the Match for his outstanding performance.

## Ishan Kishan vs NZ
Ishan Kishan scored a T20I century against New Zealand, playing a breathtaking innings of 103 off 43 balls. 
* He smashed six fours and ten sixes during his innings.
* He brought up his hundred off just 42 balls, helping India post a massive total of 271/5 in their 20 overs.
* India won the match by 46 runs, and Kishan was adjudged the Player of the Match for his outstanding performance.

## India's Chances in T20 World Cup
According to Yuzvendra Chahal, India can only lose the T20 World Cup on its own, implying that no other team has the ability to beat them. This statement reflects Chahal's confidence in India's team and their potential to win the tournament. 

* Chahal mentions that the pressure is always high during the World Cup, but several Indian players have tasted victory in the previous edition.
* He believes that India's strength is such that they are unlikely to be beaten by any other team, and their loss would be due to their own mistakes rather than the opponent's skills.
